titlegrp.title: Identification of desmostanol as a novel vertebrate sterol in short-beaked echidna secretions

author.details: School of Zoology, University of Tasmania, Private Bag 5, Hobart, Tas. 7001, Australia.
Central Science Laboratory, University of Tasmania, Hobart, Tas. 7001, Australia.
School of Zoology, University of Tasmania, Private Bag 5, Hobart, Tas. 7001, Australia.

front.abstract: Mass spectra and chromatographic data are presented to support the identification of cholest-24-en-3β-ol (desmostanol) in odorous secretions in Tasmanian short-beaked echidnas. This sterol has previously been described only in marine invertebrates and phytoplankton, and may have a role in chemical communication in the echidna.
